statements: SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics;
SELECT brand_id, awareness_score, reach_score, engagement_score FROM BrandMetrics;
SELECT brand_id, awareness_score FROM BrandMetrics WHERE reach_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics WHERE engagement_score < 30;
SELECT brand_id, awareness_score, engagement_score FROM BrandMetrics ORDER BY reach_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT awareness_score, reach_score FROM BrandMetrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT brand_id, awareness_score, engagement_score FROM BrandMetrics ORDER BY brand_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics WHERE awareness_score BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT AVG(awareness_score) AS avg_awareness, SUM(reach_score) AS total_reach FROM BrandMetrics;
SELECT * FROM BrandAwarenessReports;
SELECT id, brand_name, reach_metrics FROM BrandAwarenessReports;
SELECT brand_name, engagement_metrics FROM BrandAwarenessReports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerEngagementReports ORDER BY engagement_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_timestamp FROM CustomerEngagementReports WHERE engagement_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM BrandAwarenessReports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, reach_metrics->>'impressions' AS impressions FROM BrandAwarenessReports ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, reach_metrics->>'engagement_rate' AS engagement_rate FROM BrandAwarenessReports WHERE brand_name LIKE '%Apple%';
SELECT id, engagement_rating, engagement_timestamp FROM CustomerEngagementReports WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(engagement_rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerEngagementReports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(engagement_rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics;
SELECT brand_name, awareness_score FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics WHERE awareness_score >= 80;
SELECT id, channel_name, reach_count FROM ReachMetrics ORDER BY reach_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, awareness_score FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, engagement_level FROM CustomerEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics WHERE awareness_score > 50 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT brand_name, SUM(awareness_score) AS total_score FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics GROUP BY brand_name HAVING total_score > 100 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReachMetrics WHERE reach_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY reach_count ASC;

SELECT brand_name, engagement_level, date_recorded FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics INNER JOIN CustomerEngagementMetrics ON BrandAwarenessMetrics.id = CustomerEngagementMetrics.id WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BrandAwarenessMetrics WHERE date_recorded = '2022-05-10';
SELECT brand_name, reach_metrics, engagement_metrics FROM BrandMetrics;
SELECT customer_name, email, engagement_score FROM CustomerEngagement;
SELECT report_date, report_type, report_description FROM MarketingReports;
SELECT brand_name, reach_metrics FROM BrandMetrics WHERE reach_metrics > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics WHERE reach_metrics > 100 AND engagement_metrics < 50;
SELECT brand_name, reach_metrics FROM BrandMetrics WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, engagement_score FROM CustomerEngagement WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM MarketingReports WHERE brand_id = 2 AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE brand_id = 3 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, awareness_metric, reach_metric, engagement_metric FROM brand_metrics;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, customer_location FROM customer_data;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_spend, reach_metric, engagement_metric FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT post_id, platform, post_date, likes, shares, comments FROM social_media_metrics;
SELECT visit_id, visitor_ip, visit_date, page_views, bounce_rate FROM website_metrics;
SELECT * FROM brand_metrics ORDER BY brand_name DESC, awareness_metric ASC, engagement_metric DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend, reach_metric, engagement_metric FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_spend > 10000 ORDER BY total_spend DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, customer_location FROM customer_data WHERE customer_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT post_id, platform, post_date, likes, shares FROM social_media_metrics WHERE likes > 1000 ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT visit_id, visitor_ip, visit_date, page_views, bounce_rate FROM website_metrics WHERE bounce_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY page_views DESC, visit_date ASC;
